alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:56AM CDT until June 15 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Forest County in northeastern Wisconsin... Southeastern Oneida County in north central Wisconsin... Northwestern Langlade County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 456 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Veterans Memorial County Park, or 15 miles north of Antigo, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pearson around 500 AM CDT. Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 505 AM CDT. Woodlawn around 515 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Crandon and North Otter Creek Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
